name: Resource Extraction Task
description: Complete workflow for extracting Alpha Ore, refining to Alpha Matter, and understanding resource security

sufficientPower.description: Need 500k for Ore Extractor + 500k for Ore Refinery

steps.name: Explore and Find Planet
steps.description: Find a planet with Alpha Ore deposits

requirements.description: Current planet must have 0 ore remaining

steps.name: Build Ore Extractor
steps.description: Build Ore Extractor struct to mine Alpha Ore

steps.name: Mine Alpha Ore
steps.description: Mine Alpha Ore from planet using Ore Extractor

security.warning: Alpha Ore can be stolen by other players. Refine immediately!

steps.name: Build Ore Refinery
steps.description: Build Ore Refinery struct to refine Alpha Ore to Alpha Matter

steps.name: Refine to Alpha Matter
steps.description: Refine Alpha Ore to Alpha Matter (secure, non-stealable)

conversion.formula: 1 gram Alpha Ore = 1 gram Alpha Matter

security.warning: Alpha Matter cannot be stolen once refined. Resources are now secure!

resourceFlow.output: Alpha Matter ready for energy production or trading

alphaOre.risk: High - can be stolen by other players

alphaMatter.risk: Low - cannot be stolen through gameplay

costs.note: Economic structs require massive power investment. Plan accordingly.

refineImmediately.reason: Alpha Ore can be stolen, Alpha Matter cannot
refineImmediately.action: Refine ore as soon as it's mined

planPower.action: Ensure sufficient power infrastructure before building

multipleSites.reason: Reduces risk if one site is attacked

insufficientPower.description: Not enough power to build or operate economic structs
insufficientPower.solution: Build power infrastructure first (Reactors or Generators)

oreStolen.description: Alpha Ore was stolen before refinement
oreStolen.prevention: Build refinery before or immediately after extractor

planetEmpty.solution: Explore new planet or wait for ore regeneration

nextSteps.energyProduction: Convert Alpha Matter to energy using Reactors or Generators
nextSteps.guildCollateral: Use Alpha Matter as guild token collateral
